content: Female Patient with ACUTE ABDOMINAL PAIN

children.content: Evaluate for other sources of pain
Obtain surgical consultation. Consider Laparoscopy or Laparotomy
Strongly consider CT scan imaging. Consider PID or Appendicitis (CT 90% sensitive)
No infection. Consider Torsed adnexa, Fibroids, or Endometriosis
Consider Colonic diverticulitis, Adhesive disease and obstruction, or Adnexal masses
